attributes.action: Close all non essential manufacturing, construction and businesses
attributes.additional_details: This petition is for any worker in non essential manufacturing, construction or any non essential business to close during this current lockdown because it’s simply not safe. The rules and laws cannot be stay at home but then work in a workplace full of people
attributes.background: As the government have published, it’s another unwanted record for covid19 deaths and figures. We as workers should be protected. Not only for ourselves but for our families too. To guarantee our survival and safety through this pandemic

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566706
